title: Pecos National Historical Park: Weather
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Weather              Weather         Park Photo  Pecos National Historical Park is located at nearly 7,000 feet in altitude in the high desert region of Northern New Mexico.  Here are current weather conditions in Pecos, NM.          Church under cloudy summer sky. Park Photo by Patricia Lenihan        Winter view of church in fog. Park Photo by Patricia Lenihan
